name: Imperi
introduce: Impi provides stream-based attribution services for tokens. The token vesting feature enables users to perform actions such as setting cliff dates, canceling activity streams, transferring tokens, and automatic withdrawals to recipient wallets. Impi allows users to set up automated payroll systems and regularly scheduled transactions. Impi's multi-signature wallet enables teams to confidently manage their payments and attribution, providing summary information on open streams, signers, and more.
